game_description: Changes, changes, changes! We have ensured that House Flipper VR brings a unique experience, no matter if you ever tried virtual renovations. The veterans will definitely notice some items they have never seen before as well as a new graphic design. But all this is just the tip of the iceberg. The biggest revolution is in the gameplay itself. We have completely redefined all the mechanics: from now on you are not getting rid of all the dirt from the counter with a single click - swing that virtual brush yourself!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Czech, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish
review_1: I was enjoying the game until this chapter. Stuck and can’t move on. Job is to kill roaches, find toy, add radiators to room, spackle walls, and paint them pink. I killed roaches, found toy, and picked up tool to spackle walls, installed 2 radiators, I did all the walls ‘white’ with tool, bought the pink paint, painted all walls in room pink, and task for wall repair was at 0%. You need to be at least 75% done job to move on, but with the wall repair and paint not being registered at all, I’m stuck at around 60% of job total and can’t move forward?? Just stuck here…..I’ve uninstalled the game and played to this job with same results. I saw on an online forum that another had exact same issue. If devs could let me know if I’m doing something wrong, or update for this glitch I would appreciate it. Otherwise I’m requesting a refund as I can not progress forward with game. As far as game itself it is a bit annoying to reach to grab tool and a cabinet moves instead and it never goes back properly. I like to move like other games and not teleport as thats strange. A little more rehab of house and less cleaning, but game is good to just chill. So please fix the glitch or advise how to bypass and move forward.. TIA
review_2: This game is not like the original House flipper and is honestly such a waste of my money. It doesn’t have a lot of the features that the other game has and is not updated frequently.
review_3: Most of what you do is clean the houses and not renovate them at all. I should have listened to the reviews and not bought this game. Maybe it gets better later, but I don’t want to go through all the boredom to find out.
review_4: Want to save 25 use this link below bio link/z7xnrbhh Remove space and put (.)
review_5: Don’t get me wrong I do love playing this game from time to time, but I wish it had the features that the original game had, building new walls, being able to do garden work. Interiors design is fun and cleaning is all right but I wish there was more to this game
